Text:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1319690/

In the near future, eight astronauts from five countries (four women and four men) undertake a mysterious six-year international space mission covering thirteen billion kilometres. With the eyes of the world upon them - everything they do is monitored, and every emotion they feel, scrutinized - they soon discover that their real assignment is not at all what they thought.
this sounds so much like virtuality to me =\
indeed, glitched at 36:22 for ~10 seconds.  video & sound seem fine after 36:35 or so.

Thanks.
I Know its a Pilot. But today there
are so many shows that it must
grab me hard right from the start.
It doesnt.
If I want a show that goes: bla, bla, bla,
bla, bla, bla...
I watch the news or something.. Not a brand new sci-fi show.

Exellent Sfi-fi for me is for example Star Trek, Babylon 5 and Battlestar Galactica, where the humans fight a superior enemy like the Borg, Cylons or the Shadows.

Where the action is, if you understand what I mean?

Peace and Love!

vid 5/10   too many glitches, cant play on ps3.
aud 5/10  db level too high at recording.

show is not bad actually

A little too much Grey's Anatomy-ish bullshit romance drama for a sci-fi series!  What can you expect from the dude who helped create that piece of shit "Medical" drama, anyway.

Hurry up, Caprica!!!!  Let's get some Cylon ass-kicking goin' on!  I don't need "Grey's Anatomy In Space."
